[px], about this afternoon class, please study by yourself first.
I have to deal with something.

I already put today's assignment and commissions
from people nearby on the Quest Board.

Many people entrust the Academy to help them with all kinds of stuff.
You can complete commissions that match your abilities
and accumulate experience.

Everybody needs practice. It is easier to learn by
practicing than simply studying. All right then,
I look forward to seeing your progress next time we meet.
